resources.string: Mytestbuddy is a very simple idea – while using social gaming technology and Web 2.0 infrastructure, Lodhari technologies has created a fun learning environment for students.

Mytestbuddy is developed to comprehend to the educational needs of any student, be it a medical graduate seeking admissions in post graduation course or a school child preparing for his examinations. 

Mytestbuddy provides a comprehensive platform which creates a competitive, responsive and motivating environment, making the monotonous and tedious learning process a livelier, relaxed and enriching experience. 

At mytestbuddy you can interact with your peers and professors, seek guidance and share ideas. Here you can meet friends and like-minded people who are preparing for similar entrance examination and can become each others’ support and study partners. 

You can also ask questions to professors and ask for advice.
Mytestbuddy’s notes bank will help you to create notes while preparing for subjects and store them in an orderly fashion for personal or for public benefits.

Mytestbuddy helps prepare students for standardized tests including the AIPGMEE, GMAT, GRE, CAT, AIEEE and IIT- JEE. \n\nMytestbuddy plans to provide an inclusive curriculum for preparation of these examinations and tutorials to suit the needs of all students.
Contact our Support Center to receive assistance with your needs.
Monday – Friday : 10:30a.m. to 6:30p.m.\nPhone hours are as per Indian Standard Time

Lodhari Technologies Pvt. Ltd.

127, Siddhivinayak Complex,
Behind Railway Station,
Alkapuri,
